Getting Started#

Install cassiopy with pip#

cassiopy is available on the python package index as cassiopy:

$ pip install cassiopy

The minimum version requirement for python is 3.8. After installation, you have the cassiopy executable available system-wide. In addition, you can now import the cassiopy python package.
